activity.title: Activity 1
activity.instructions: Read the recipe. Click on the correct response.

graphic.oae-label: graphic file name (optional). Please include the file extension (.jpg or .png)

audio.oae-label: audio file name (optional). Please include the file extension (.mp3)

question.reader:
Chicken My Way Ingredients
  • 1 chicken in eight pieces
  • 4 tablespoons of olive oil
  • 2 yellow onions
  • 1 red pepper
  • 1 green pepper
  • 1 yellow pepper
  • 8 cloves of garlic
  • 6 tomatoes (one small can)
  • salt
  • pepper
Procedure
  1. Sauté the chicken in a large pan in 2 tablespoons of oil.
  2. Put the chicken on a plate.
  3. Cut the garlic, peppers, and onions.
  4. Put 2 tablespoons of oil in the pan and cook the garlic, peppers, and onions until they are light brown.
  5. Put the chicken back into the pan with the vegetables and the tomatoes.
  6. Cover the pan and cook slowly for 20-30 minutes.
  7. Add salt and pepper and serve.

graphic.oae-label: graphic file name (optional). Please include the file extension (.jpg or .png)

audio.oae-label: audio file name (optional). Please include the file extension (.mp3)
